entry.title: Hat Charm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Watchus
Type: Charm - Medium
Price: 6.00 - 13.50 (7 variants)

A monarch butterfly sits on top of this wide brim hat while a fresh bouquet of flowers adorn the rim. Wrapped around the center of the hat is a beautiful bow that ties in the back. This charm is the perfect gift for the beach lover.
